title: News24.com | SA has screened 900 000, tested 108 000 for Covid-19, but more must be done - Mkhize
description: In just 44 days since South Africa confirmed its first Covid-19 case, 108 021 people have been tested for the virus, and around 900 000 have been screened by health workers, Health Minister Zweli Mkhize says.
content:
In just 44 days since South Africa confirmed its first Covid-19 case, 108 021 people have been tested for the virus, and around 900 000 have been screened by health workers.
